# Configuration for module: CMakeListGenerator



if (LINUX)
  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/main.cpp
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "LINUX" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

elseif (WIN32)
  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/main.cpp
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN32" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

elseif (WIN64)
  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES 
    src/main.cpp
  )

  set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_INSTALL "WIN64" )
  source_group( "Platform Source Files" FILES ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

endif ()

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )


if( LINUX )
  set( MODULE_NAME "CMakeListGenerator" )
elseif( WIN32 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "CMakeListGenerator" )
elseif( WIN64 )
  set( MODULE_NAME "CMakeListGenerator" )
endif()
if( LINUX )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN32 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
elseif( WIN64 )
  add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} WIN32 ${ALL_FILES} )
endif()

if ( LINUX )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "CMAKELISTGENERATOR_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "CMAKELISTGENERATOR_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefMT gucefCORE )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "CMAKELISTGENERATOR_BUILD_MODULE" )
endif( WIN64 )

include_directories( ../../common/include ../../gucefCORE/include ../../gucefMT/include )

if ( LINUX )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/linux )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/mswin )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../../gucefCORE/include/mswin )
endif( WIN64 )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********




if (LINUX)
GUCEF_config_tool( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN32)
GUCEF_config_tool( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN64)
GUCEF_config_tool( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()
